rooms.description: Central gathering area with open layout and Kerala woodwork detailing.
Spacious dining space adjacent to the living room.
Traditional Kerala kitchen with modern amenities integrated.
Two-car garage with integrated storage and utility access.

openings.description: Entrance featuring a traditional Kerala archway.
Large windows for natural light, aligned with Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with a private balcony and en-suite bathroom.
Secondary bedroom maintaining traditional Kerala aesthetic.
Additional bedroom for children or guests.
Dedicated home office space with ample natural lighting and views.

openings.description: Window placements designed per Vastu guidelines for optimal air flow and light.
Balcony in master bedroom offering views of the surrounding landscape.

additional_features.description: Rooftop terrace with traditional Kerala elements, including wooden pergola and seating area.
Lush garden space designed around the farmhouse to enhance ambience and adhere to Vastu principles.
